APIÂ¶

Provide information about the API for the product or service. If the API is extensive, create a separate API reference document by using the API guide template. Following is example introductory and reference text:

The <PRODUCT NAME> API provides developers with HTTP methods to administer the service.

The documentation for the <PRODUCT NAME> API is located at <URL>.

If the API is not extensive and you want to document it here, group the methods into logical categories, as needed, and then use the HTTP request template to document the methods.

For examples of topics that use this template, see API (example of reference to external guide) and API (example of API content).
